posts.post_content:
Presents very well for the grade.  Everyone needs a mid grade Apple Sov in their collection.  How about you?

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/12059/oleary-fielding-app-sov[/IMG]

Thanks David

Hi Frank. What is an "apple" sovereign? :o:confused:
Thank you. Jeff
Apple green color (lighter) to the back as opposed to forest green (darker)
Payment sent. Thanks, Frank. So this is my fourth Sovereign but first "Apple Green". These are exciting times.

posts.post_title: Did not get up early enough...
posts.post_content:
Too bad for me but great for the buyer.  Very nice.  How are  ya doin, Frank?

Keith
